mapper.select: SELECT cg.*, cgm.user_id as user_id FROM ms_chat_group cg LEFT JOIN ms_chat_group_member cgm ON cg.id = cgm.group_id AND cgm.delete_flag = 'Used' WHERE cg.delete_flag = 'Used' AND cg.id = #{id}

select cg.*, u.real_name as creator_name FROM ms_chat_group cg left join sys_user u on cg.creator = u.id and u.delete_flag = 'Used' WHERE cg.delete_flag = 'Used' AND cg.id in ( select cgm.group_id FROM ms_chat_group_member cgm WHERE cgm.delete_flag = 'Used' AND cgm.user_id = #{userId} )

select cg.*, u.real_name as creator_name from ms_chat_group cg left join sys_user u on cg.creator = u.id and u.delete_flag = 'Used' where cg.delete_flag = 'Used' ORDER BY cg.create_date desc LIMIT ${limitStart}, ${size}
SELECT count(1) FROM ms_chat_group WHERE delete_flag = 'Used'
